name: Escape Velocity
flavor_text: "The first step toward truth is to let go of all that we know and hold dear." —Arach Jalaal

frame.name: Lightweight Frame
frame.description: Superb handling. Move faster with this weapon equipped.

perks.description:
Rugged and simple iron sights. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: IS 2 Classic

perks.description:
Shots from this weapon knock the target back farther.
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: High-Caliber Rounds

perks.description: Melee final blows reload this weapon's magazine from reserves.
